title: Best of Tom Bilyeu AMA | November 2018
description: Tom answers questions from the community. You can submit your questions in advance to ama@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”.   This episode of AMA is brought to you by skillshare.  Www.skillshare.com/impact   To subscribe, check us out on itunes: https://apple.co/2GPJRqu   PEOPLE MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE Jim Kwik: http://bit.ly/2AvpL3B [3:47]   QUESTION TOPICS: How to learn faster and more effectively in 4 simple steps [2:00]   How to sustain motivation and leverage shame and pain to become who you want to be [5:23]   What to do if you’re faced with a life decision (like having a kid) far too early [9:53]   Which matters more: mindset or action?  [14:19]   Tom’s 90 day challenge - if you do this, your work life will drastically improve [19:18]   What you need to do if you want to become great at anything (and specifically speaking) [23:11]   How to reward yourself and become congruent with the person you want to be (and why you should want to acquire skills) [26:52]   How to make money while still doing what you love [30:03]   Are some days boring and numbing even when you’re pursuing your passion?  [33:08]
